Title: The Beautiful Country
Writer: Sabina Murray (story), Lingard Jervey (story), Sabina Murray (screenplay)
Actors: Damien Nguyen, Bai Ling, Thi Hoa Mai, Nick Nolte
Plot: After reuniting with his mother in Ho Chi Minh City, a family tragedy causes Binh to flee from Viet Nam to America. Landing in New York, Binh begins a road trip to Texas, where his American father is said to live.
